Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class StudentStoreCharacter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Character
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.StudentStoreCharacter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Jsonable, StudentContainerInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Jester, PriestAndPrincess, StudentStoreCharacterTest.MockCharacter
abstract class StudentStoreCharacter extends Character implements StudentContainerInterface
Represents and abstract character card that has the ability to store students a maximum amount of students.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentStoreCharacter

      StudentStoreCharacter(CharacterType characterType, int maxStudentAmount)
      Base constructor. Sets up the card's initial cost, character and maximum number of students that this card can have.
      Parameters:
      characterType - this card's character
      maxStudentAmount - the maximum amount fo students this card can hold
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if characterType is null

    • StudentStoreCharacter

      Returns a copy of the passed Character
      Parameters:
      old - Character to copy
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if old is null

  • Method Details

    • doPrepare

      Tuple<PreparePhase,Character> doPrepare(PreparePhase phase)
      PreparePhase hook. This implementation additionally requests maxStudentAmount of Student from the Sack. Subclasses should call this implementation if they want this behaviour.
      Overrides:
      doPrepare in class Character
      Parameters:
      phase - the PreparePhase the card's hook has been called from
      Returns:
      a Tuple containing the updated PreparePhase and the updated Character
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if phase is null

    • remove

      public Tuple<StudentStoreCharacter,Student> remove(PieceColor color)
      Remove and return a Student of the given color from the store.
      Specified by:
      remove in interface StudentContainerInterface
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student to remove
      Returns:
      A Tuple<StudentStoreCharacter, Student> with the new Character instance and the removed student
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the color passed is null
      EmptyStackException - if there are no students of the specified color in the container
      EmptyContainerException - if the container is empty

    • remove

      public Tuple<StudentStoreCharacter,Student> remove() throws EmptyContainerException
      This method removes a random Student from the container, and returns it with a new container instance, not containing the removed student.
      Specified by:
      remove in interface StudentContainerInterface
      Returns:
      A Tuple<Container, Student> with the new container instance and the removed student
      Throws:
      EmptyContainerException - if the container is empty

    • add

      public StudentStoreCharacter add(Student student)
      Adds the given Student to the internal store.
      Specified by:
      add in interface StudentContainerInterface
      Parameters:
      student - the student to add
      Returns:
      the new container instance including the new student
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student to add is null
      ContainerIsFullException - if the container is already full (if there is a bound to the number of students)

    • moveFromHere

      Tuple<ActionPhase,Character> moveFromHere(Tuple<ActionPhase,StudentStoreCharacter> tuple, PieceColor color, ThrowingBiFunction<ActionPhase,Student,ActionPhase,InvalidPhaseUpdateException> stuffer, ThrowingBiFunction<ActionPhase,StudentStoreCharacter,Tuple<ActionPhase,StudentStoreCharacter>,InvalidPhaseUpdateException> retriever) throws InvalidPhaseUpdateException
      Maps the given tuple to a new one where the student of the specified color has been stuffed somewhere in an ActionPhase by the given function. A new student will be placed on the card by the given retriever.
      Parameters:
      tuple - a Tuple containing an ActionPhase and a StudentStoreCharacter
      color - the color to extract from the card
      stuffer - a ThrowingBiFunction that takes an ActionPhase and a Student
      retriever - a ThrowingBiFunction that takes and ActionPhase and a StudentStoreCharacter
      Returns:
      a Tuple containing the updated ActionPhase and Character
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null
      InvalidPhaseUpdateException - if this card doesn't have ar least ont student or either the stuffer or retriever fail
